channel.title: Desktop Fun/Games...Very Fun!...Throw Bricks At Your Computer!
channel.description:
[size=20pt][u][b]Windows Operating System[/b][/u][/size]
[b]Brick[/b] -Info Hate your desktop? Try throwing this brick at it!
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/9839/brickhz0.jpg[/img][/URL] Download [url=http://www.computerpranks.com/download/programs/fun/brick.zip]HERE[/url]
~ ~ ~
[b]Desktop Destroy 2[/b] -Info Desktop Destroy Chicken Carnage is a game wherein you have to kill as much chickens as possible within a time limit. You can use several weapons and goodies to reach your goal. How more chickens you kill, how more points you get. How more original you kill them, how more points you get. Example: You can use your bloodtube on a chicken and then shoot it, to gain more points than just shooting it. But you also can use your bubblegun on a chicken, then use your bloodtube on the bubble and then flame it, and gain even more than more points! Be original and gain points, but also be quick and sadistic, that's where Destkop Destroy is all about.
Where the hell is part one? It's gone. Hehe, that rhymes.
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img170.imageshack.us/img170/6382/dekstopdestroyky7.jpg[/img][/URL] Download [url=http://www.computerpranks.com/download/programs/fun/Desktop2.exe]HERE[/url] NOTE:once you get to the screen you see above you must hit the "ENTER"Key ~ ~ ~
[b]Desktop Dot[/b] -Info From the far reaches of India comes the ultimate desktop companion! The Desktop Dot is more than just a stupid dot that rests atop your desktop and babbles anything it damn well pleases. It's a companion, a friend, and probably the only creature on this godforsaken planet that truly loves you. It's wit and wisdom is sure to lift your spirits and keep you smiling. Desktop Dot is highly configurable and has full install/uninstall support. So download your copy today
DownLoad [url=http://www.rjlsoftware.com/download/dot.zip]HERE[/url]
~ ~ ~
[b]Desktop Games[/b] -Info With this software you can play with your Windows desktop. You can chop it, cut it, shoot to pieces, repaint or stamp it. Or you can put termites on it and after that chase them. The fun goes on and one with this fun desktop game
Picture Coming Soon! Download [url=http://www.computerpranks.com/download/programs/fun/desktopgames.exe]HERE[/url]
~ ~ ~
[b]Dipsy[/b] Note:This Is Pretty Gay -Info Here is this small desktop toy for your every lasting enjoyment
Download [url=http://www.computerpranks.com/download/programs/fun/dipsy.exe]HERE[/url]
~ ~ ~
[b]Windows Snow[/b] -Info You can have your Windows be covered with snow. This fun seasonal program sits in your Windows tray and has many options from Wind, Speed and Snowflake consistancy. This fun, free program is great for the holidays.
Download [url=http://www.computerpranks.com/download/programs/fun/winsnow98.exe]HERE[/url]
~ ~ ~
[b]WinEyes[/b] -Info WinEye places a pair of cartoonish-looking eyes on your desktop that always look towards your mouse pointers current location. The eyes blink occasionally, complete with optional sound effects. You can drag and drop the program to place it where you prefer on your desktop. While WinEye is running, a system-tray icon appears with a right-click menu for access to the programs functions. You can adjust properties for blinking and sleeping, colors, size, sounds, and more. If you want to have access to the area of the screen behind WinEye it will be hidden automatically. If you have registered your copy, you'll get a code for switching off the reminder that appears after WinEye is started. The registration charges will be given to SOS Children's Villages organisation.
Dowload [url=http://www.computerpranks.com/download/programs/fun/wineye2001e.exe]HERE[/url]
~ ~ ~
All In One Package This Includes All Of The Programs Above
[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=NWS09M4X]Mega-Upload[/url] [url=http://rapidshare.de/files/33334595/All_In_One_Desktop_Games.rar]Rapid-Share[/url]
[size=20pt][u][b]Macintosh Operating System[/b][/u][/size]
[b]Help Me II[/b] Your Mac chokes out a plea for assistance, and writes the plea on the desktop, using folders to form the letters. Quite an effect, if we do say so ourselves...
[tt][b]Installation:[/b][/tt] This item is an extension, drag it onto a closed System Folder, and it will automatically be placed into the Extensions folder, where it belongs. When the computer is restarted, the extensions should take effect. In some cases there is a PowerPC version of the program, which you should use on any Mac with a PowerPC processor in it. Use the regular version for older 68k Macs. In cases where there is only one version, it will work on just about any Mac. Additional requirements are listed with the files. Note: If the computer's sound is turned all the way down, extensions that play sounds won't be noticeable.
[tt][b]Removal:[/b][/tt] Just remove it from the Extensions folder of your System folder, and restart your Mac. It is that simple! DOWNLOAD [url=http://www.inspiredlogic.com/halloween/helpMeBotII.hqx]HERE[/url]
~ ~ ~
[b]Redecorate[/b] The most meticulous of the all! Complains about the look of your computer, and then changes the theme. This can change the fonts, soundtrack, colors, the desktop pattern, etc., for a wild effect. NOTE: THIS CHANGES THE LABELS OF ALL THE ITEMS ON THE DESKTOP. IF YOU RELY ON THE LABELS OF ITEMS ON YOUR DESKTOP, DON'T USE THIS.
[tt][b]Installation:[/b][/tt] This item is an extension, drag it onto a closed System Folder, and it will automatically be placed into the Extensions folder, where it belongs. When the computer is restarted, the extensions should take effect. In some cases there is a PowerPC version of the program, which you should use on any Mac with a PowerPC processor in it. Use the regular version for older 68k Macs. In cases where there is only one version, it will work on just about any Mac. Additional requirements are listed with the files. Note: If the computer's sound is turned all the way down, extensions that play sounds won't be noticeable.
[tt][b]Removal:[/b][/tt] Just remove it from the Extensions folder of your System folder, and restart your Mac. It is that simple! DOWNLOAD [url=http://www.inspiredlogic.com/halloween/haveToRedecorateBot.hqx]HERE[/url]
~ ~ ~
[b]What A Mess[/b] Complains about the arrangement of the items on your desktop, and then reorganizes them all, by name, or size, or... NOTE: THIS CHANGES THE LABELS OF ALL THE ITEMS ON THE DESKTOP. IF YOU RELY ON THE LABELS OF ITEMS ON YOUR DESKTOP, DON'T USE THIS.
[tt][b]Installation:[/b][/tt] This item is an extension, drag it onto a closed System Folder, and it will automatically be placed into the Extensions folder, where it belongs. When the computer is restarted, the extensions should take effect. In some cases there is a PowerPC version of the program, which you should use on any Mac with a PowerPC processor in it. Use the regular version for older 68k Macs. In cases where there is only one version, it will work on just about any Mac. Additional requirements are listed with the files. Note: If the computer's sound is turned all the way down, extensions that play sounds won't be noticeable.
[tt][b]Removal:[/b][/tt] Just remove it from the Extensions folder of your System folder, and restart your Mac. It is that simple! DOWNLOAD [url=http://www.inspiredlogic.com/halloween/whatAMessBot.hqx]HERE[/url]
~ ~ ~
[b]Wrong Color[/b] Complains about the color of the items on your desktop, and then changes them all. NOTE: THIS CHANGES THE LABELS OF ALL THE ITEMS ON THE DESKTOP. IF YOU RELY ON THE LABELS OF ITEMS ON YOUR DESKTOP, DON'T USE THIS.
[tt][b]Installation:[/b][/tt] This item is an extension, drag it onto a closed System Folder, and it will automatically be placed into the Extensions folder, where it belongs. When the computer is restarted, the extensions should take effect. In some cases there is a PowerPC version of the program, which you should use on any Mac with a PowerPC processor in it. Use the regular version for older 68k Macs. In cases where there is only one version, it will work on just about any Mac. Additional requirements are listed with the files. Note: If the computer's sound is turned all the way down, extensions that play sounds won't be noticeable.
[tt][b]Removal:[/b][/tt] Just remove it from the Extensions folder of your System folder, and restart your Mac. It is that simple! DOWNLOAD [url=http://www.inspiredlogic.com/halloween/wrongColorBot.hqx]HERE[/url]

[size=20pt]Windows Operating System[/size]

Brick
-Info
Hate your desktop? Try throwing this brick at it!


Download HERE

~
~
~

Desktop Destroy 2
-Info
Desktop Destroy Chicken Carnage is a game wherein you have to kill as much chickens as possible within a time limit. You can use several weapons and goodies to reach your goal. How more chickens you kill, how more points you get. How more original you kill them, how more points you get.
Example: You can use your bloodtube on a chicken and then shoot it, to gain more points than just shooting it. But you also can use your bubblegun on a chicken, then use your bloodtube on the bubble and then flame it, and gain even more than more points! Be original and gain points, but also be quick and sadistic, that’s where Destkop Destroy is all about.

Where the hell is part one? It’s gone. Hehe, that rhymes.


Download HERE
NOTE:once you get to the screen you see above you must hit the "ENTER"Key
~
~
~

Desktop Dot
-Info
From the far reaches of India comes the ultimate desktop companion! The Desktop Dot is more than just a stupid dot that rests atop your desktop and babbles anything it damn well pleases. It’s a companion, a friend, and probably the only creature on this godforsaken planet that truly loves you. It’s wit and wisdom is sure to lift your spirits and keep you smiling. Desktop Dot is highly configurable and has full install/uninstall support. So download your copy today

DownLoad HERE

~
~

Desktop Games
-Info
With this software you can play with your Windows desktop. You can chop it, cut it, shoot to pieces, repaint or stamp it. Or you can put termites on it and after that chase them.
The fun goes on and one with this fun desktop game

Picture Coming Soon!
Download HERE

Dipsy Note:This Is Pretty Gay

Here is this small desktop toy for your every lasting enjoyment

Windows Snow
-Info
You can have your Windows be covered with snow. This fun seasonal program sits in your Windows tray and has many options from Wind, Speed and Snowflake consistancy.
This fun, free program is great for the holidays.

Download HERE

~
~
~

WinEyes
-Info
WinEye places a pair of cartoonish-looking eyes on your desktop that always look towards your mouse pointers current location. The eyes blink occasionally, complete with optional sound effects. You can drag and drop the program to place it where you prefer on your desktop. While WinEye is running, a system-tray icon appears with a right-click menu for access to the programs functions. You can adjust properties for blinking and sleeping, colors, size, sounds, and more. If you want to have access to the area of the screen behind WinEye it will be hidden automatically. If you have registered your copy, you’ll get a code for switching off the reminder that appears after WinEye is started. The registration charges will be given to SOS Children’s Villages organisation.

Dowload HERE

~
~
~

All In One Package
This Includes All Of The Programs Above

Mega-Upload
Rapid-Share

[size=20pt]Macintosh Operating System[/size]

Help Me II
Your Mac chokes out a plea for assistance, and writes the plea on the desktop, using folders to form the letters. Quite an effect, if we do say so ourselves…

[tt]Installation:[/tt]
This item is an extension, drag it onto a closed System Folder, and it will automatically be placed into the Extensions folder, where it belongs. When the computer is restarted, the extensions should take effect. In some cases there is a PowerPC version of the program, which you should use on any Mac with a PowerPC processor in it. Use the regular version for older 68k Macs. In cases where there is only one version, it will work on just about any Mac. Additional requirements are listed with the files. Note: If the computer’s sound is turned all the way down, extensions that play sounds won’t be noticeable.

[tt]Removal:[/tt]
Just remove it from the Extensions folder of your System folder, and restart your Mac. It is that simple!
DOWNLOAD HERE

~
~
~

Redecorate
The most meticulous of the all! Complains about the look of your computer, and then changes the theme. This can change the fonts, soundtrack, colors, the desktop pattern, etc., for a wild effect.
NOTE: THIS CHANGES THE LABELS OF ALL THE ITEMS ON THE DESKTOP. IF YOU RELY ON THE LABELS OF ITEMS ON YOUR DESKTOP, DON’T USE THIS.

[tt]Installation:[/tt]
This item is an extension, drag it onto a closed System Folder, and it will automatically be placed into the Extensions folder, where it belongs. When the computer is restarted, the extensions should take effect. In some cases there is a PowerPC version of the program, which you should use on any Mac with a PowerPC processor in it. Use the regular version for older 68k Macs. In cases where there is only one version, it will work on just about any Mac. Additional requirements are listed with the files. Note: If the computer’s sound is turned all the way down, extensions that play sounds won’t be noticeable.

[tt]Removal:[/tt]
Just remove it from the Extensions folder of your System folder, and restart your Mac. It is that simple!
DOWNLOAD HERE

~
~
~

What A Mess
Complains about the arrangement of the items on your desktop, and then reorganizes them all, by name, or size, or…
NOTE: THIS CHANGES THE LABELS OF ALL THE ITEMS ON THE DESKTOP. IF YOU RELY ON THE LABELS OF ITEMS ON YOUR DESKTOP, DON’T USE THIS.

[tt]Installation:[/tt]
This item is an extension, drag it onto a closed System Folder, and it will automatically be placed into the Extensions folder, where it belongs. When the computer is restarted, the extensions should take effect. In some cases there is a PowerPC version of the program, which you should use on any Mac with a PowerPC processor in it. Use the regular version for older 68k Macs. In cases where there is only one version, it will work on just about any Mac. Additional requirements are listed with the files. Note: If the computer’s sound is turned all the way down, extensions that play sounds won’t be noticeable.

[tt]Removal:[/tt]
Just remove it from the Extensions folder of your System folder, and restart your Mac. It is that simple!
DOWNLOAD HERE

~
~
~

Wrong Color
Complains about the color of the items on your desktop, and then changes them all.
NOTE: THIS CHANGES THE LABELS OF ALL THE ITEMS ON THE DESKTOP. IF YOU RELY ON THE LABELS OF ITEMS ON YOUR DESKTOP, DON’T USE THIS.

[tt]Installation:[/tt]
This item is an extension, drag it onto a closed System Folder, and it will automatically be placed into the Extensions folder, where it belongs. When the computer is restarted, the extensions should take effect. In some cases there is a PowerPC version of the program, which you should use on any Mac with a PowerPC processor in it. Use the regular version for older 68k Macs. In cases where there is only one version, it will work on just about any Mac. Additional requirements are listed with the files. Note: If the computer’s sound is turned all the way down, extensions that play sounds won’t be noticeable.

[tt]Removal:[/tt]
Just remove it from the Extensions folder of your System folder, and restart your Mac. It is that simple!
